ai-tha-ap426:0.3_0: Hearing the seven chains, seniors, and junior seniors.
ai-tha-ap426:1.4_0: and they stayed in the same place.
ai-tha-ap426:2.2_0: one should not raise joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap426:3.1_0: since the legal procedure of ejection was
ai-tha-ap426:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap426:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap426:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap426:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Makhādeva Mango Grove.
ai-tha-ap426:9.1_0: The fourth part of the senior monks are worth a sixteenth part of the senior monks.
